snippet.title: Idol Manager Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Do you have what it takes to conquer the Japanese entertainment industry?

In this idol business simulator, you are given full control of a small talent agency! Create your own idol groups, produce singles, sell out concert arenas, manage disharmony and scandals, or even take out a loan from a loan shark! The possibilities are endless as you aim for the top.

Idol Manager, created by Russian indie game developer Glitch Pitch, is coming to Steam on 27th July, 2021.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/821880/
